name: Sovra Ai by Virtuals
description: Sovra Al is a mobile-first, Al-powered Web3 wallet designed to simplify crypto trading-especially within the Virtuals Protocol ecosystem. It acts as both a smart wallet and an autonomous trading assistant, using conversational Al to help users discover, evaluate, and execute trades on Al agent tokens. As Virtuals grow, Sovra grows. Sovra AI is an autonomous, AI-powered, mobile-first Web3 wallet designed for trading digital assetsâ€”especially agent tokens within the Virtuals Protocol ecosystem. It integrates AI-driven market analysis, autonomous trading features, and a conversational interface into a secure, user-friendly mobile app.
